scripts.build: (npm run build:markup -s) & (npm run build:images -s) & (npm run build:styles -s) & (npm run build:scripts -s)
scripts.start: (npm run clean -s) & (npm run build -s) & (npm run server:start) & (npm run watch)
scripts.watch:markup: nodemon -w source -e html            -x "(npm run build:markup)  && (npm run server:reload)"
scripts.watch:images: nodemon -w source -e svg,png,jpg,gif -x "(npm run build:images)  && (npm run server:reload)"
scripts.watch:styles: nodemon -w source -e scss            -x "(npm run build:styles)  && (npm run server:reload)"
scripts.watch:scripts: nodemon -w source -e js              -x "(npm run build:scripts) && (npm run server:reload)"
scripts.watch: (npm run watch:scripts -s) & (npm run watch:styles -s) & (npm run watch:images -s) & (npm run watch:markup -s)
